header.subtitle: Consistently rated as excellent by 235-40r17 drivers
Consistently rated as excellent by 235-40r17 drivers
Most popular among drivers in PA

content.body:
### Shop 235/40R17 Tire Size
What kinds of vehicles are rolling on 235/40R17 tires? This is a tire size you might find on a late 90s to early 2000s Alfa Romeo or Lotus, 90s-era BMW 3 Series, 2000s-era Honda Accord and Subaru Impreza WRZ, and Lexus CT models.

Popular vehicles: 
1997-2002 Alfa Romeo GTV
1995 BMW M3
2002-2008 Honda Accord
2011-2017 Lexus CT
1997-2004 Lotus Esprit
2000-2007 Subaru Impreza WRZ

Most drivers use all-season tires thanks to their ability to perform well in dry, wet, and light winter weather conditions. Check out the [Toyo Proxes Sport A/S](https://simpletire.com/brands/toyo-tires/proxes-sport-a-s), Vercelli Strada II, and Nankang NS-25 All Season UHP if you need a set of 235/40R17 all-season tires for your ride.

Ultra-high-performance tires are designed to give drivers sporty traction and handling plus quicker acceleration and braking in warmer weather conditions. Consider the Pirelli P Zero Asimmetrico, [Yokohama Advan Fleva V701](https://simpletire.com/brands/yokohama-tires/advan-fleva-v701), or Nitto NT05 if you want a set of 235/40R17 tires that performs at the highest level in warmer weather.

Whether you drive a BMW M3, Honda Accord, Lexus CT, or something else, SimpleTire has a set of 235/40R17 tires that meets your needs at a great price!

info.title: Did you know?
info.body: A reliable brand is the #1 ask for most drivers. Here you can shop all the most popular brands and discover new ones – all tested, ranked and rated by our customers.
